channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Yellow sign facing wrong way and pointing people the wrong way down cycle lane, 25th November
item.description:
Yellow sign for cycle lane Northbound on Drayton Park (just north of Aubert Park) has come loose and is now facing the wrong way and pointing cyclists the wrong way down the cycle lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73A, Drayton Park, Finsbury Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Yellow sign that points to the right has gone, 25th November
item.description:
There is a traffic island in the road here. The big yellow sign with a right arrow on it has been knocked over and now disappeared. This leaves a traffic island in the road with no signage and this is very dangerous in the dark. This route is used by emergency vehicles at speed and I'm worried something will hit the traffic island. Please replace the sign. This affects eastbound traffic and is on the hilly bit of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aubert Park, Highbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: STILL haven’t collected recycle box filled with rubbish behind the stomp of the tree I’ve been complaining for about 2 years, 25th November
item.description:
Still haven’t collected all rubbish behind this tree it’s just been left they clear on the grass but not behind tree and it isn’t my rubbish and it’s on communal area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Keedonwood Road, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
